Dirt.Description:
This dirt block looks and functions similar or identical
to the ones on Earth. Can be placed adjacent to a block.

Dark Dirt.Description:
This dirt is very dark and can grow some weird grasses which being looked as skyblue clouds.
Can be placed adjacent to a block.

Stone.Description:
This stone block looks and functions similar or identical
to the ones on Earth. Can be placed adjacent to a block.

Milkore.Description:
An ore that its colouring looks like milk, but it can be
useful to craft something durable despite its looking.

Shinyore.Description:
This ore is shiny! It probably contains some sort of chemicals
 for chemical reaction to make itself illuminate instead of shine through visible light.
It can be used to craft components which later on for crafting more advanced utilities.

Magmaore.Description:
It emits dim red light and it feels warm when touched it.
It doesn't burns despite it looks like a very hot stuff like lava on Earth!
Also, it is very hard to break.

Refined Bar.Description:
It is refined from milkore.
Can be used to make something useful such as tools.

Component.Description:
It is made with refined bars and shinyores.
Can be used to make advanced tools and other utilities.

Gel.Description:
It is dropped by a slime.
Can be used to make tools and other utilities.

Engine.Description:
A spaceship engine.
Can compatible with your escape pod, too!

Thruster.Description:
A spaceship thruster.
Can be installed into your escape pod.

Mining Laser.Description:
A laser that is designed to mine dirts, stones and ores,
slow mining power, but it gets the job done.

Mining Laser - MK1.Description:
This is an improved version of the mining laser tool.
The speed of this tool is slightly faster than the basic one.

Mining Laser - MK2.Description:
The MK2 edition of the mining laser can emit more laser points to mine multiple blocks at the same time.
They will be constantly spreading around the area where the user point at.

Energy Sub-machine Gun.Description:
This weapon has high firing rate with decent attack capability.
It can shoot accurately at mid-range.

Energy Scatter Gun.Description:
This weapon has low firing rate but can shoot multiple projectiles and they scatter randomly.
It can only shoot accurately at point-blank range but it deals huge damage when all projectiles shot onto a target.

Explorer Suit.Description:
This is a basic spacesuit mainly for exploring the area which lacks of oxygen,
it stops the incoming damage poorly, but it has a shield to protect the user before it depletes.

EE-suit.Description:
The abbreviation of Environmental-Experimentation suit. This suit is designed to withstand
almost every kind of pollutions including the chemical pollution, has an extended shield capacity and faster shield recharge rate.
It is a bit heavier and has lower damage resistance than the explorer suit.

Guardian Suit.Description:
This suit has the highest protection rating in the world, at least, the world of this very game.
Basically nobody gets to make or access this suit except the scientists in the secret lab at somewhere.

This hasn't been tested on field so use at your own risk.
